All Classes

Class Description
Action
Parent / template for all actions in Booking System
ActionCapable
Interface that allows for storage of allowable actions by particular entity
AddBalanceAction
template for different types of payments that will add to user balance
AddBookingAction
Allows booking to be added to system
ApplePay
implements a type of payment with a maximum amount of 1000.00 as an AddBalanceAction
Application
to run the main program
Booking
Creates a booking instance for a vehicle
BookingSystem
class that holds the available vehicles for booking, creates a consoleMenu for current user.
ConfirmAction
Finalises the list of bookings for the user
DisplayBookingAction
Shows all the bookings currently in the user's list
EngineType
enumeration of types of engines
ExitAction
closes the Booking System.
GooglePay
implements a type of payment as an AddBalanceAction
Menu
creates the consoleMenu that booking system will use
Payment
template for many different types of payments
RemoveBookingAction
removes a specific booking from the user's booking list.
Sedan
Subclass of Vehicle, with additional attributes: range, engType
SUV
Subclass of Vehicle, with additional attributes: seats, engType
Truck
Subclass of Vehicle, with additional attributes: loading
User
user that is able to select what to do within the booking system
Utility
creation of ID for Vehicles
Vehicle
template for default vehicle, contains attributes any vehicle would ahve
ViewBalanceAction
Shows user's current balance in the system
